alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:40PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern St. Louis County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1040 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Mountain Iron, to Floodwood, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Virginia and Mountain Iron around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Meadowlands and Toivola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
